page.title: 15TRADE-S CREAKE
page.content: The Post Office & General Store in 17th century buildings provide a wide range of goods, a postal service with 2 daily collections and a dry-cleaning agency. The Parish Council notice board is in the shop window, where forthcoming events can be advertised free in the shop, and is a meeting place for news and gossip to be told. The family Butchers,currently employing 3 generations, has a weekly delivery of carcases, providing a comprehensive range of fresh meat and poultry plus homemade sausages. There is a daily delivery to surrounding villages and restaurants. The Ostrich Inn serves excellent meals and has outside catering service. An old barn is being converted to a function room. There are 7 builders, one of which is an Undertaker & Funeral Director.
